articles.title: Asian shares tick up on China property relief, focus shifts to Sino-U.S. talks - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares were mostly higher on Tuesday, as relief in China's property sector supported sentiment while investors also kept a close eye on a key meeting between U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese leader Xi Jinping.
